class.name: StorelessUnivariateStatisticAbstractTest

javadoc.text: Return a new instance of the statistic
Expected value for the testArray defined in UnivariateStatisticAbstractTest
Verifies that increment() and incrementAll work properly.

method.name: testIncrementation
method.comment: Add testArray one value at a time and check result
Add testArray all at once and check again

javadoc.text: Make sure that evaluate(double[]) and inrementAll(double[]), * getResult() give same results.
Verifies that copied statistics remain equal to originals when * incremented the same way.

method.name: testCopyConsistency
method.comment: Randomly select a portion of testArray to load first
Put first half in master and copy master to replica
Now add second part to both and check again
